page.title: 04RELIGION:CHURCH LIFE
page.content: There are nine churches in our area. We asked the following questions: A:How many people were in church last Sunday? B:How many people were in church at the main service of the year? C:How many services are held each week? D:Has the congregation increased or decreased over the past 10 years? A B C D ST,MARY'S 112 165 4 STABLE TWEEDMOUTH 145 150 6 UP PRIOR PARK 100 80 2 UP BANKHILL URC 110 140 2 DOWN BAPTIST 160 200 3 UP METHODIST 70 70 2 STABLE ST.ANDREWS* 25 53 1 DOWN WALLACE GREEN* 27 52 1 DOWN KINGDOM HALL(J)164 125 5 UP *C.of SCOTLAND J:JEHOVAH'S WITNESS There is also the Salvation Army Hall
